appDescription.description: The application description. You can alter this to fit the languages better, but emphasis on the `Easy web styling` part.

stylesFor.description: Header text for styles section in the extension popup

manageStyles.description: Label for Style Manager button and section header

settings.description: Label for Settings button and section header

addNewStyle.description: Button text for adding a new style

saveButton.description: Button text for saving a style

cancelButton.description: Button text for canceling an action

closeButton.description: Button text for closing a dialog or page

applyButton.description: Button text for applying an action

applying.description: Loading text when applying an action

applyToSiteButton.description: Button text for applying styles to current site

removeButton.description: Button text for removing a style

configureButton.description: Button text for configuring style variables

deleteButton.description: Button text for deleting a style

styleInstalled.description: Success message when a style is saved

styleRemoved.description: Success message when a style is removed

styleDeleted.description: Success message when a style is deleted

noStylesFound.description: Message when no styles are available

dragDropHint.message: Seret dan lepas file .user.css di sini
dragDropHint.description: Hint text for drag and drop area

manager_addUserCss.description: Button text to open Add UserCSS File dialog

font_apply.description: Button text to open Create Font Style menu

font_builtin_description.message: Pilih dari koleksi font yang telah dipilih dengan hati-hati

font_custom_description.message: Masukkan nama font yang terinstall di sistem Anda

font_custom_inputLabel.description: Label for custom font input field

font_custom_placeholder.message: contoh: Arial, Times New Roman, Comic Sans MS
font_custom_placeholder.description: Placeholder text for custom font input

font_custom_checkButton.description: Button text to check font availability

font_custom_available.description: Message when custom font is available

font_custom_notAvailable.message: Font tidak ditemukan di sistem Anda
font_custom_notAvailable.description: Message when custom font is not available

font_error_emptyName.description: Error when font name is empty

font_error_selectFont.description: Error when no font is selected

font_error_notAvailable.message: Font '$1' tidak tersedia di sistem Anda
font_error_notAvailable.description: Error when custom font is not available

font_error_parseFailed.description: Error when font UserCSS parsing fails

font_error_installFailed.description: Error when font style installation fails

font_error_applyFailed.description: Generic error when font application fails

font_applied.description: Success message when font is applied

font_createFontStyle.description: Text for the Create Font Style creation button and dialog title

font_selectLabel.description: Label for the font selection dropdown

font_selectPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the font selection dropdown

font_applyButton.description: Button text to apply selected font

colors_apply.description: Button text to open Create Color Style menu

ERR_STORAGE_QUOTA.message: Kapasitas penyimpanan terlampaui. Silakan hapus beberapa gaya untuk membebaskan ruang.
ERR_STORAGE_QUOTA.description: Error message when storage capacity is exceeded

ERR_STORAGE_INVALID_DATA.description: Error message for invalid storage data with details

ERR_MESSAGE_TIMEOUT.description: Error message for message timeout with attempts and message type

ERR_MESSAGE_INVALID.description: Error message for invalid message with reason

ERR_FILE_FORMAT_INVALID.message: Format file $2 tidak valid. Hanya file berformat $1 yang dapat diterima
ERR_FILE_FORMAT_INVALID.description: Error message for invalid file format with expected and actual format

ERR_DATA_CORRUPTED.description: Error message for corrupted data with details

ERR_BROWSER_API.description: Error message for browser API errors with API, operation, and error details

ERR_PERMISSION_DENIED.description: Error message for permission denied errors with permission name

ERR_PARSE_METADATA.description: Error message for metadata parsing failures

ERR_PREPROCESSOR_COMPILE.description: Error message for preprocessor compilation failures

ERR_INJECTION_CSP.message: Kebijakan Keamanan Konten (CSP) memblokir injeksi gaya
ERR_INJECTION_CSP.description: Error message for CSP blocking style injection

ERR_PERMISSION_REQUIRED.description: Error message for missing permissions with permission name

ERR_FONT_LOAD.description: Error message for font loading failures with font name
